description: Detection well-known mimikatz command line arguments
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov
oscd.community
David ANDRE (additional keywords)
Tim Shelton
name: HackTool - Mimikatz Execution
query: ((process.command_line.text:("*DumpCreds*" OR "*mimikatz*")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*\:\:aadcookie*" OR "*\:\:detours*" OR "*\:\:memssp*" OR "*\:\:mflt*" OR "*\:\:ncroutemon*" OR "*\:\:ngcsign*" OR "*\:\:printnightmare*" OR "*\:\:skeleton*" OR "*\:\:preshutdown*" OR "*\:\:mstsc*" OR "*\:\:multirdp*")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*rpc\:\:*" OR "*token\:\:*" OR "*crypto\:\:*" OR "*dpapi\:\:*" OR "*sekurlsa\:\:*" OR "*kerberos\:\:*" OR "*lsadump\:\:*" OR "*privilege\:\:*" OR "*process\:\:*" OR "*vault\:\:*")))
